name: DEXO
public_notice: DEXO (DEXO) has migrated from their older contract to a new V2 contract. For more information, please view this announcement on Twiiter.
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Dexo is the World's 1st C-DEX decentralized exchange, a one-of-its-kind ex­change with the potential to change how crypto traders and investors engage with DEXs. C-DEX combines the pros of "Centralized & Decentralized Exchanges" to offer a holistic trading experience for our users.
